com.alvarpq.GOTF.requirement

Class UnitRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alvarpq.GOTF.requirement.UnitRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Requirement

    public class UnitRequirement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Requirement
    This class is used by cards who needs to target units (mostly spells).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private RequirementType type
      The type of unit that is required.
      private Unit unit
      The unit that has been targeted, can be null.
